nodes.text: Umjing Baab was a male Rughja who led an orchestra-band called Umjing Baab and His Swinging Trio—which, despite its name, was made up of Baab and only two, not three, other musicians. Since he, like the rest of his band, was a fifteen-limbed Rughja, he could play the kloo horn, the nalargon, and at least eight other instruments simultaneously.
